explains: v. <旧>（尤指蛇）以眼神震慑（人，动物），使无法动弹；深深吸引，迷住

sentences.en: Angels fascinate, as Christmas-card-makers rediscover every year.
sentences.cn: 天使令人着迷，正如圣诞卡制造商们每年一再发现的那样。

sentences.en: Eleven institutions and companies from across Europe are contributing to FascinatE, including the BBC, Technicolor and Salford University.
sentences.cn: 11家欧洲的学术机构和公司参与到了FascinatE计划中，这包括 BBC、Technicolor和 Salford 大学。

sentences.en: The private lives of movie stars never fail to fascinate.
sentences.cn: 电影明星的私生活总为人所津津乐道。
